trans-unit.source: An endpoint that uses WS-Discovery to find the endpoint address dynamically at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Um ponto de extremidade que usa o WS-Discovery para localizar o endereço de ponto de extremidade dinamicamente em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: When you use a DynamicEndpoint a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> is added to the binding you specify in the DynamicEndpoint constructor if not already present.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa um DynamicEndpoint um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>é adicionado à associação de você especifica no construtor DynamicEndpoint se não estiverem presentes.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A> property enables you to describe the service you want to use.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A>propriedade permite que você descrever o serviço que você deseja usar.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> used by the DynamicEndpoint override these values specified in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A>e o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint>usado pela substituição DynamicEndpoint esses valores especificados em <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint.FindCriteria%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DynamicEndpoint"> </xref> classe com o especificados <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that provides a discovery endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que fornece um ponto de extremidade de descoberta.
Um provedor de ponto de extremidade de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria"></xref> used to search for a service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria"> </xref> usados para procurar um serviço.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria> is used to describe the service to call.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria>é usado para descrever o serviço de chamada.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria>
